meanings.definition: The quality or state of being wearisome.
meanings.sent1: The wearisomenesses of the long meeting made everyone yawn.
meanings.sent2: Her constant complaints about the weather's wearisomenesses annoyed her friends.
meanings.sent3: The wearisomenesses of waiting in line for hours was finally broken by a funny joke.
meanings.sent4: The wearisomenesses of the daily commute felt like carrying a heavy burden.
meanings.sent5: The wearisomenesses of studying for the test felt like trudging through deep mud.

meanings.definition: The feeling of being tired or bored due to something being repetitive or dull.
meanings.sent1: After hours of watching the same movie, wearisomenesses set in.
meanings.sent2: The wearisomenesses of doing chores on a Saturday morning was palpable.
meanings.sent3: The wearisomenesses of listening to the same song on repeat was comical after a while.
meanings.sent4: The wearisomenesses of the routine made each day blend into the next.
meanings.sent5: The wearisomenesses of the lecture made it hard to keep my eyes open.
